title: Type ID - Candide (architectural journal)

author: jackrgardiner

comments.content: Don't know this one. Alternatives: [Revenue Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802222638/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/value/sans), [Underground](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802222638/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/underground-pro) (single storey /a as [alternate](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802222638/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/underground-pro/p22-underground-pro-medium/glyphs.html#glyphs/385077/998)), [Johnston](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802222638/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/johnston), [Brown](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802222638/http:/lineto.com/The%20Fonts/Font%20Categories/Text%20Fonts/Brown)

This is a rare breed of font called "rotalic". Try searching for that.

Related: [http://typographica.org/on-typography/a-fruitful-discomfort-the-face-of-...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802222638/http:/typographica.org/on-typography/a-fruitful-discomfort-the-face-of-the-2012-olympics/ "http://typographica.org/on-typography/a-fruitful-discomfort-the-face-of-the-2012-olympics/")

ok thanks! no idea still where to find it, but that brown is super sexy I'd give my right arm for that.
